wikipedia_page.main: Michael Louis Samuels (14 September 1920 – 24 November 2010) was a British historical linguist, responsible for the Historical Thesaurus of English.

response: Her elder brother was Michael Samuels (1920–2010), a historical linguist responsible for the Historical Thesaurus of the Oxford English Dictionary.
